product_name: Menasha Ridge Press 60 Hikes Within 60 Miles: San Diego - 2nd Edition
long_description: Elevate yourself above the urban hurry and hike to your heart's content! This updated edition of 60 Hikes within 60 Miles: San Diego features 60 hikes within an hour's drive of San Diego.
short_description: Elevate yourself above the urban hurry and hike to your heart's content! This updated edition of 60 Hikes within 60 Miles: San Diego features 60 hikes within an hour's drive of San Diego.
